title: Ticket #4367: Bosco Blahp fails for condor on rhel6+ systems
description:
An error in the request-memory.patch file of blahp causes submissions to HTCondor pools to fail. 

blah_job_submit() failed: submission command failed (exit code = 1) (stdout:Failed to submit-Error-) (stderr:/home/lannon/bosco/glite/bin/condor_submit.sh: line 244: [: missing `]'-)

The line in question should be able to be inline edited in the patch file (request-memory.patch).
check_ins: 2014-May-30 11:56   Check-in [40286]: Bosco Blahp fails for condor on rhel6+ systems. #4367 Fix a typo in the patch to condor_submit.sh in the blahp for request_memory. Some versions of bash will abort otherwise. (By Jaime Frey )
creator: dweitzel
